knimeNode.name: PMF Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node reads in models from a PMF file.

fullDescription.intro:
This node reads in models and data from a PMF file in disk. The generated PMF files support the following cases:
Experimental data
Primary model with data
Primary model without data
Two steps secondary model
One step secondary model
Manual secondary model
Two steps secondary model
One step secondary model
Manual secondary model
fullDescription.option: Path of the file to read.
